item.title: Snow
item.description: Second step. Letâ€™s place me and you In your shoes. What do you choose? Child You are a foster Fire. In this space. Time for this Party To be a tardy prostitute. Dare I solute. To your mighty Promiscuous ways. But, darling please. What does Prometheus weigh? You might kiss to begin. But this breakfast has already committed sin. The stars in your eyes. Much obliged. Hold and Grant your authorship.
